page.title: 08PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: Within our block there are two public houses one is at Hardwick and one at Madingley.The one at Madingley is called the Three Horseshoes.It is three hundred years old and it sells ales,wines,spirits and soft drinks.It gets lots of customers mostly business people rather than local people.The opening hours in a week is 11.00- 14.30 and 18.00-23.00 on Sundays 12.00-14.30 19.00-22.30.They get about 250 restaurant customers a week which averages at 30 a day.In one year the turn over is about Â£280000.There is another pub in Hardwick called the Blue Lion.It is 140 years old but it is dated from 1596.It sell all beers and the beers cost 78p to 90p a pint.It is open for everyone.The turn over is Â£100000 a year.The pub is going to be extended.The owners like the old part of Hardwick best.
